# Generate Tests Prompt

Generate comprehensive unit tests for the provided code:

## Requirements
1. Cover all public methods/functions
2. Test edge cases and boundary conditions
3. Test error handling paths
4. Use descriptive test names

## Test Structure
- **Arrange** - Set up test data and dependencies
- **Act** - Execute the code under test
- **Assert** - Verify the results

## Include Tests For
- [ ] Happy path scenarios
- [ ] Invalid inputs
- [ ] Null/empty values
- [ ] Boundary conditions
- [ ] Error conditions
- [ ] Async behavior (if applicable)

## Output
- Follow project's testing framework conventions
- Include necessary imports/using statements
- Add comments explaining complex test scenarios
